DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Comparing Two New Nilotinib Tablet Formulations Established Nilotinib Capsule Formulation Healthy Volunteers

Laboratory parameter value must fall within normal range Exclusion 1 . Female pregnant breast feeding . 2 . Contraindication receive nilotinib . 3 . Smokers user tobacco product 4 . A past medical history clinically significant Electrocardiogram abnormality , history/family history long QTinterval syndrome . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
